casebody.data:
William S. MILLS, as Guardian ad Litem for Alex Pitts; Melissa Pitts and Jeff Pitts
v.
Richard DWANE, M.D.; Private Diagnostic Clinic, PLLC; and Duke University. No. 516P04-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 18, 2005. Burley B. Mitchell, Jr., Raleigh, Charles R. Holton, Research Triangle Park, for Dwane, et al. Donald H. Beskind, Raleigh, for Mills, et al.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 6th day of January 2005 by Defendant in this matter for Order Recognizing Automatic Stay, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 18th day of January 2005."
